## toObserver() function

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function toObserver<T>(nextHandler?: Observer<T> | ((value: T) => void), errorHandler?: (error: any) => void, completionHandler?: () => void): Observer<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  nextHandler | [Observer](./xstate.observer.md)<></>&lt;T&gt; \| ((value: T) =&gt; void) | _(Optional)_ |
|  errorHandler | (error: any) =&gt; void | _(Optional)_ |
|  completionHandler | () =&gt; void | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

[Observer](./xstate.observer.md)<></>&lt;T&gt;
